attributes.action: get prisoners to ride exersize bikes daily to power the national grid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would help the country reduce the amount of power needed to be produced by more convetional methods. Prisoners would be expected to ride for up to 4 hours a day on a shift pattern to suit power usage of the population. This would have the added benefit of keeping prisoners busy and less likely to riot. Also it would help the nation reduce our carbon footprint.
